statements: DELETE FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE material_name = 'Plastic' AND toxicity_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity WHERE name = 'Carbon Nanotubes'
DELETE FROM RegulatorySubmissions WHERE submission_type = 'New Submission'
DELETE FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity WHERE toxicity_level > 5 AND research_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RegulatorySubmissions WHERE submission_type = 'New Submission' AND submission_date > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM NanoMaterials WHERE material_name = 'Carbon Nanotubes'
DELETE FROM ToxicityStudies WHERE study_id = 3 AND researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Findings WHERE studio_id = 2 AND study_date = '2022-01-15';
